creator: arham_abdullah
title: electromagnet
description: This project demonstrates how to create a temporary electromagnet using an iron bar, copper wire, and a battery.
steps: Coil the copper wire tightly around the iron bar, leaving the ends free to attach to the battery.
Attach the ends of the copper wire to the battery terminals, ensuring electricity is flowing through the wire.
Test the electromagnet by attempting to pick up small metal objects like nails.
Secure the wire ends to the battery terminals with electrical tape to maintain a consistent connection.
